greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Squarefree part of the total number of arrangements of a set with n elements.
link: F. Luca and I. E. Shparlinski, On the squarefree parts of floor(e*n!), Glasgow Math. J., 49 (2007), 391-403.
program: (PARI) a(n) = core(n! * polcoeff(exp(x + x*O(x^n)) / (1 - x), n))
results.author: _Michel Marcus_, Feb 27 2013
